channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump deploys National Guard to Memphis, calling it a ‘replica’ of his crackdown on Washington
item.description: President Trump has announced the deployment of the National Guard to Memphis to combat crime, testing the limits of presidential power by using military force in cities.

item.title: Kennedy’s vaccine committee plans to vote on COVID-19, hepatitis B and chickenpox shots
Trump threatens to take over DC police again over immigration enforcement
